item.title: Are you a bubble?
item.description:
Assuming a greenfield job market with infinite demand, would you be able to find a job tomorrow if you got fired today?

If, during the interview process they only asked you things a someone at your role should know; if they only asked you to solve a problem you had solved before; would you be able to conjure up the knowledge and experience you relied upon or acquired to do it the first time, and be able to do it again and explain it clearly from first principles?
